Ellen DeGeneres dobitnica nagrade za življenjske dosežke
05 Nov 2019, 11:47 by STA

Ellen DeGeneres bo na 77. podelitvi filmskih in televizijskih nagrad zlati globus prejela nagrado za televizijske dosežke Carol Burnett. Komičarka in voditeljica priljubljene televizijske oddaje je po besedah predsednika združenja tujih dopisnikov v Hollywoodu pionirka, ki že skoraj 25 let navdušuje občinstvo s svojim šarmom in duhovitostjo.



Ellen DeGeneres bo na 77. podelitvi filmskih in televizijskih nagrad zlati globus prejela nagrado za televizijske dosežke Carol Burnett.  Foto: Vir: Wikipedia

LOS ANGELES > V izjavi ob naznanitvi nagrajenke je predsednik združenja Lorenzo Soria povedal, da Ellen DeGeneres ni uspešna le na televiziji, ob tem je filantropinja in zagovornica ljudi, ki nimajo lastnega glasu, poroča spletni portal Los Angeles Times.
Ellen je bila za zlate globuse nominirana že trikrat za vlogo lastnice knjigarne Ellen Morgan v televizijski seriji Ellen. Ta je v 90. letih orala ledino, ko je naslovna junakinja in z njo Ellen DeGeneres leta 1997 razkrila svojo istospolno identiteto. Serija je bila tako ena prvih večjih na televiziji z osebo z odkrito istospolno usmerjenostjo v glavni vlogi.
Njena oddaja The Ellen DeGeneres Show, ki traja že 16 let, je v kategoriji za pogovorne oddaje kar enajstkratna dobitnica nagrade Daytime Emmy, v kategoriji voditeljev pa je nagrado prejela štirikrat.
Novica o nagradi je prišla mesec dni po tem, ko je v javnosti zakrožil posnetek s tekme ameriškega nogometa. Na njem se namreč voditeljica in aktivistka za pravice LGBTQ sproščeno pogovarja z bivšim predsednikom ZDA Georgem W. Bushem, ki so ga nekateri uporabniki twitterja označili za vojnega zločinca in spomnili na njegove negativne poglede na poroke istospolnih parov.
Ellen se je kritik branila v svoji oddaji, rekoč da so si ljudje različni in da je tako prav. "Prijateljujem z veliko ljudmi, ki nimajo enakih prepričanj kot jaz," je povedala.
Nagrado Carol Burnett za življenjske dosežke v televizijski umetnosti so letos januarja podelili prvič. Kot prva jo je dobila petkratna dobitnica zlatih globusov, igralka in komičarka Carol Burnett, po kateri je nagrada tudi dobila ime.
Nagrado bodo Ellen DeGeneres podelili 5. januarja na 77. podelitvi filmskih in televizijskih nagrad zlati globus.

Ellen DeGeneres wins lifetime achievement award
05 Nov 2019, 11:47 by STA

Ellen DeGeneres will receive the Carol Burnett Television Achievement Award at the 77th Golden Globes Film and Television Awards. The comedian and host of a popular television show, according to the president of the Hollywood Association of Foreign Correspondents, is a pioneer who has impressed audiences with her charm and wit for nearly 25 years.



Ellen DeGeneres will receive the Carol Burnett Television Achievement Award at the 77th Golden Globes Film and Television Awards. Photo: Source: Wikipedia

LOS ANGELES> In a statement announcing the award, Lorenzo Soria, president of the association, said that Ellen DeGeneres is not only successful on television, being a philanthropist and an advocate for people who do not have a voice, according to the Los Angeles Times.
Ellen has been nominated three times for the Golden Globes for her role as owner of the Ellen Morgan bookstore on the Ellen television series. The latter paved the way in the 1990s when the title character, and with her Ellen DeGeneres, revealed her same-sex identity in 1997. The series was thus one of the first major on television with a person with a frankly same-sex orientation in the lead role.
Her 16-year-old The Ellen DeGeneres Show has won the Daytime Emmy Award eleven times in the Conversation Show, and has received the Award four times in the Leadership Category.
The news of the award came a month after a clip from an American football match was circulated in public. The speaker and LGBTQ rights activist has a relaxed conversation with former US President George W. Bush, identified by some twitter users as a war criminal and recalling his negative views on same-sex marriage.
Ellen defended herself in her show, saying that people are different and that's right. "I make friends with a lot of people who don't have the same beliefs as I do," she said.
The Carol Burnett Award for lifetime achievement in television art was presented this January for the first time. She was the first to receive a five-time Golden Globes Award, actress and comedian Carol Burnett, after whom she was named.
The award will be presented to Ellen DeGeneres on January 5 at the 77th Golden Globe Film and Television Awards.
